name: hello-xr
description: This should (hopefully) follow/match the `hello-xr` demo by Immersification, section by seection.

scripts.comment1: ^ The above command does not work on Windows!(because of `rm`, duh...)
scripts.comment2: So here's an equivalent command for cmd on Windows!
scripts.cmdclean: rmdir /S /Q dist & rmdir /S /Q node_modules & del package-lock.json
